title: The Farmer's Daughter
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. This restaurant focuses on organic and local agriculture, while also catering to vegetarians. Although many of the dishes contain meat, there are also meatless alternatives, such as veggie burgers, tacos, and even veggie sausage. There's always quite a crowd.
